siteMetadata.title: Nicolas Bontempo
siteMetadata.subtitle: Experimental ground to develop my own ideas and share them with others

frontmatter.title: Deploy dotnet core application on app engine with github actions
frontmatter.description: In this tutorial, I will describe for you how to set up a Github actions workflow and this will enable your project to automatically run your tests, build your app and deploy the new code to google app engine service. At the time of this tutorial the last Dotnet core version supported was 2.1, so I created a docker file to deploy on Dotnet core 3.1.

frontmatter.title: Getting started with Ansible
frontmatter.description: Ansible is a open source tool backed by red hat since 2015, that gives you the skill to control and configure multiple server from one single location. So, instead of having to go to each server and configure them, you can create automations with Ansible to do that for you. The benefits of Ansible are that...
